metadata.description: NCCI Medically Unlikely Edits (MUE) — Oncology + Imaging Subset

adjudicationTypes.1: Claim line — total units across all lines for same DOS
adjudicationTypes.2: Day — total units for same code same DOS across claims
adjudicationTypes.3: Date of service — absolute per-day limit
